alert.note: Alert for Barron; Polk; Rusk; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 16 at 8:20PM CDT until March 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow, blowing snow, and icy roads. 1 to 3 inches of snow earlier Thursday, combined with winds gusting as high as 40 mph will continue to create blowing and drifting snow through the night. In addition, temperatures crashing into the teens has allowed roads to become icy. * WHERE...Eastern Minnesota and northwest Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
